headline: Biden Scraps Pandemic-Based Immigration Restriction
sentences: On Friday, the CDC released a statement that said, in part, "After considering current public health conditions and an increased availability of tools to fight COVID-19 (such as highly effective vaccines and therapeutics), the CDC Director has determined that an Order suspending the right to introduce migrants into the United States is no longer necessary."
